song_name: Por Lo Que Reste de Vida
metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Por Lo Que Reste de Vida has complexity on par with the typical song, having near-average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity and Chord-Melody Tension and below-average scores in Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion:
Por Lo Que Reste de Vida is written in the key of E Major.  

According to the Theorytab database, it is the 5th most popular key among Major keys and     the 5th most popular  among all keys. Major keys, along with minor keys, are a common choice for popular songs.  The three most important chords, built off the 1st, 4th and 5th scale degrees are all major chords (E Major, A Major, and B Major).
